libpart.description: Three pin crystal (GND on pin 3), e.g. in SMD package
ESP8266 ESP-12 module, 16 pins, 2mm, PCB antenna
High Voltage 32-channel serial to parallel converter with Open Drain outputs
Russian 10 digit Nixie tube with two decimal points
Push button switch, generic, two pins
